report.title: Fond Memories
report.author: Empster
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I have worked in computer shops...tech work..for quite a long time now..and it's a common thing to keep a case or 2 of this stuff on hand. /n /n When i first started using it, I would get a somewhat nitrous-like experience...distorted sounds, little visuals (i'll let it be known i've not done much nitrous, just a few balloons at concerts etc., so I may not be relating this very well). /n /n OOOH BOY did things start to change. I mean, I've done shrooms, lsd, all that, but OOOOH BOY /n /n The first sign was a tightening around the temples..and my eyeglasses would seem to move further from my point of view. Things would start to look familiar, but VERY different. /n /n Soon I met ZEB..a quick little 4' mischevious dude, always just running around a corner, and with a devilish laugh that i can still hear. How did i know his name? These creatures, they tend to repeat words or phrases in an echoey sort of manner. Zebzebzebzebzeb..etc. I remember chasing him around the small office several laps (thank god nobody was there), before saying to myself..ITS NOT REAL. is it? /n /n He never meant harm, but I swear he wanted to drive me crazy. /n /n Keep in mind, it wasn't during every session that i would trip this hard, but it came in spurts, usually while i was alone, with some sort of background sounds, tv, radio, other voices. /n /n There were others: /n /n Blah : somewhat of an ogre, dimwitted but scary, liked to sing along with van halen /n /n Little green fairies: when they spoke i was overcome with a sense of joy, peace. very sentimental to me. they lived among the empty cans. /n /n The little old lady: wanted a beer, so did i, but it was working time ;( /n /n The seductress: always came up behind me..humming softly, soothingly, while I sat or stood facing a wall. When her mouth came close to my ear and her arms encircled me was the best, and as the buzz wore off she would slip away. Never got a good look, but long hair, very slight, loving. /n /n I could go on forever here /n /n The sunbeam forcefield, shocked me when i tried to cross it. /n /n Occasional fear of just having swallowed metal shavings /n /n Time frame of buzz : not long, 30sec to maybe 2.5 min..but intense(duh) /n /n I would really love to hear from anyone with a similar experience, I don't do this any longer for fear of damage, but it is really a fond memory..I do not regret it in any way. /n /n This was true hallucination to me, not distortion of reality, but the real thing. /n /n Had a major trip listening to 'my woman from tokyo' during the funky solo part..tick tock tick tock, everything started moving like a pendulum, too sweet.
